prompts: Create a butterfly Pokemon that has vibrant blue wings and a charming personality.
Imagine a Bug-type Pokemon that can blend into forest environments with its white and red colors.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon with a mix of blue and white, perfect for a serene garden habitat.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles an insect with delicate wings and a friendly disposition.
Design a Pokemon with unique red eyes and a light body that flits around flowers.
Make a small Pokemon that has elegant wings and thrives in grassy areas, showing off its beauty.
I want a colorful Bug-type Pokemon that captivates everyone with its graceful flight.
